description: Detects a base64 encoded IEX command string in a process command line Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Encoded IEX
query: process.command_line:(*SUVYIChb* OR *lFWCAoW* OR *JRVggKF* OR *aWV4IChb* OR *lleCAoW* OR *pZXggKF* OR *aWV4IChOZX* OR *lleCAoTmV3* OR *pZXggKE5ld* OR *SUVYIChOZX* OR *lFWCAoTmV3* OR *JRVggKE5ld*)
